Positive: and yes i take #COVID19 seriously i have a bunch of dear friends who have been in quarantine for weeks now in shanghai, only now going out. it’s pretty tough and the rate of the spread of infection worrying and still mysterious but fortunately the death rate is still very low.
Negative: viruses don’t recognise borders or the passports people carry.... we need international co- operation as a response to #covid19 not scaremongering, the blame game and worse yet....nationalist rhetoric... that’s not going to help anyone, stay informed and don’t feed into panic
